entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Wet flurries over higher terrain overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. 60 percent chance of wet flurries over higher terrain early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016
